General.Name: Fourth Dimension Solutions Limited
General.Description: Fourth Dimension Solutions Limited operates as an information technology (IT) infrastructure, technical support services, and operations outsourcing company in India. The company engages in the designing, developing, deploying, and delivering IT infrastructure and services. It also provides various information technology and consultancy services, including infrastructure services, end user IT support, IT asset life cycle, and integrated solutions. In addition, the company undertakes turnkey projects for computers, digitization of documents, and data entry services; and operates data and information processing centers. Fourth Dimension Solutions Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in New Delhi, India.
